fields.name: message
fields.desc: The text to display in the tooltip.

fields.name: richMessage
fields.desc: The rich text to display in the tooltip.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The minimum height of the [Tooltip]'s message.

fields.name: constraints
fields.desc: Constrains the size of the [Tooltip]'s message.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of space by which to inset the [Tooltip]'s message.

fields.name: margin
fields.desc: The empty space that surrounds the tooltip.

fields.name: verticalOffset
fields.desc: The vertical gap between the widget and the displayed tooltip.

fields.name: preferBelow
fields.desc: Whether the tooltip defaults to being displayed below the widget.

fields.name: excludeFromSemantics
fields.desc: Whether the tooltip's [message] or [richMessage] should be excluded from the semantics tree.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: decoration
fields.desc: Specifies the tooltip's shape and background color.

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: The style to use for the message of the tooltip.

fields.name: textAlign
fields.desc: How the message of the tooltip is aligned horizontally.

fields.name: waitDuration
fields.desc: The length of time that a pointer must hover over a tooltip's widget before the tooltip will be shown.

fields.name: showDuration
fields.desc: The length of time that the tooltip will be shown after a long press is released (if triggerMode is [TooltipTriggerMode.longPress]) or a tap is released (if triggerMode is [TooltipTriggerMode.tap]). This property does not affect mouse pointer devices.

fields.name: exitDuration
fields.desc: The length of time that a pointer must have stopped hovering over a tooltip's widget before the tooltip will be hidden.

fields.name: enableTapToDismiss
fields.desc: Whether the tooltip can be dismissed by tap.

fields.name: triggerMode
fields.desc: The [TooltipTriggerMode] that will show the tooltip.

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: Whether the tooltip should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.

fields.name: onTriggered
fields.desc: Called when the Tooltip is triggered.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: ignorePointer
fields.desc: Whether this tooltip should be invisible to hit testing.
